properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued January 14 at 2:31PM PST until January 15 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 30 to 40 kt with
occasional gusts up to 50 kt. For the Storm Warning, south winds
35 to 45 kt with gusts up to 55 kt. Seas 15 to 22 ft at 10
seconds expected. For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and
hazardous seas 15 to 20 ft at 13 seconds expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to
30 kt and seas 12 to 14 ft at 13 seconds.

* WHERE...For the Small Craft Advisory and Hazardous Seas Warning,
all areas. For the Storm Warning, from Gold Beach north and
generally beyond 8 nm of shore, except just offshore near Cape
Blanco.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 10 PM PST Wednesday.
For the Storm Warning, from 7 AM to 4 PM PST Wednesday. For
the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 PM Wednesday to 4 AM PST
Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds and very steep seas could capsize
or damage vessels. Visibilities will be significantly reduced.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for very strong winds and very steep and hazardous seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY
